testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I change the Math App engine selection to "MapleNet (Math App)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "A test question with inline MathApp"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I choose "Numeric" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I see the "Numeric with Units" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I choose "Math App" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I see the "Math App" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Test Assignment with Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click the import question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I select the question "A test question with inline MathApp"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I choose to import questions from the Add dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then The import questions dialog appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I select the question "One more test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "One more test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Test Assignment with Questions" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And it is named as "Test Assignment with Questions" in "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I change the Math App engine selection to "Disable"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I start the "Test Assignment with Questions" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I see the error message "Unable to connect to the MapleNet server."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I use "Next" button to navigate to "Question 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula question is rendered properly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: When I use "Back" button to navigate to "Question 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I see the error message "Unable to connect to the MapleNet server."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: Then I save and quit the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create an assignment with inline MathApp question, take the assignment, and navigate through the questions.
